block.p: A picture credit with an article on Sunday about criticism of the pace of an investigation into a crash in which a New Jersey State Police car struck a minivan in September, killing two teenage sisters, misidentified the source of one of two photographs. Only the picture on the right, of a memorial to the victims, was by Laura Pedrick for The New York Times. The other picture, of the victims and their mother, was provided by the family.

A picture credit with an article on Sunday about criticism of the pace of an investigation into a crash in which a New Jersey State Police car struck a minivan in September, killing two teenage sisters, misidentified the source of one of two photographs. Only the picture on the right, of a memorial to the victims, was by Laura Pedrick for The New York Times. The other picture, of the victims and their mother, was provided by the family.
